A children's book about a magical tree that grows upside down, where all the animals in the forest live together in harmony.
An interactive game for kids where they have to help the tree grow by solving puzzles and completing challenges.
A short film that follows the journey of a young girl who discovers the upside-down tree in her backyard and forms a special bond with one of its inhabitants.

A podcast series that interviews people from different walks of life who have been impacted by the upside-down tree in some way, whether it's through their childhood experiences or their current work.
A sculpture installation that invites viewers to interact with the upside-down tree by climbing on its branches or sitting inside its hollow trunk.
